body:
Code review ACK 58a9601dffa6d9b3b881a476169458787d382919

> Note that we already define NOMINMAX globally when building with MSVC.

I was about to ask this. Good.

The only remaining definition after this is in leveldb:
```
src/leveldb/util/env_windows.cc:#ifndef NOMINMAX
src/leveldb/util/env_windows.cc:#define NOMINMAX
src/leveldb/util/env_windows.cc:#endif  // ifndef NOMINMAX
```

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25152](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25152) (refactor: Split util/system into exception, shell, and fs-specific files by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
